annotation.spannedText: Vaccinations have helped stop the spread of the disease in the U.S., but there are still cases reported

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinations have helped stop the spread of the disease in the U.S., but there are still cases reported

annotation.spannedText: most adults born in 1957 or later should get at least one dose of the MMR vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: most adults born in 1957 or later should get at least one dose of the MMR vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Because of the risk of birth defects, all women of childbearing age should have the MMR vaccine unless they're pregnant or have proof of immunity, or proof of already being vaccinated for rubella

classMention.mentionClass: Because of the risk of birth defects, all women of childbearing age should have the MMR vaccine unless they're pregnant or have proof of immunity, or proof of already being vaccinated for rubella

annotation.spannedText: adults at greater risk of measles or mumps should get two doses of MMR vaccine, the second one 4 weeks after the first

classMention.mentionClass: adults at greater risk of measles or mumps should get two doses of MMR vaccine, the second one 4 weeks after the first

annotation.spannedText: Pregnant women should not get the MMR vaccine due to risks to the baby

classMention.mentionClass: Pregnant women should not get the MMR vaccine due to risks to the baby

annotation.spannedText: Women who get the MMR vaccine should wait 4 weeks before getting pregnant

classMention.mentionClass: Women who get the MMR vaccine should wait 4 weeks before getting pregnant

annotation.spannedText: Adults who have had a life-threatening allergic reaction to gelatin, a previous MMR vaccine, or a medication called neomycin should not get the vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Adults who have had a life-threatening allergic reaction to gelatin, a previous MMR vaccine, or a medication called neomycin should not get the vaccine

annotation.spannedText: The safest and most effective ingredients in the MMR vaccine used today include "attenuated" forms of each virus, which means they're live forms of the virus that have been made weak in medical labs

classMention.mentionClass: The safest and most effective ingredients in the MMR vaccine used today include "attenuated" forms of each virus, which means they're live forms of the virus that have been made weak in medical labs

annotation.spannedText: For most adults, the benefits of the MMR vaccine outweigh the risks

classMention.mentionClass: For most adults, the benefits of the MMR vaccine outweigh the risks
